title: Vladislav Vizilter
text: Vladislav Vizilter (born 17 August 1979) is a Kyrgyzstani <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202000%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Middleweight">men's middleweight</a> event at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a>.
